We elected a human being, Barack Obama .`` I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment,'' Colin Powell said, which I think is the major problem facing America right now. Dismissing speculation that he might take a job in the Barack Obama administration, possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role.
